## Upcoming Matches on 8th February
The following match is scheduled for 8th February:

* **AFG vs NZ**: This match will be held at the **MA Chidambaram** stadium, and will begin at **11:00 IST (05:30 GMT)** as part of the ICC MT20 WC, 2026.

## Key Points to Note:
* The ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2026 features a total of **20 teams**.
* The semi-finals of the T20 World Cup 2026 will be held on **March 4 and 5**, with the final scheduled for **March 8**.
* Pakistan will play all their matches in **Colombo, Sri Lanka**, with matches split between the **SSC stadium** and the **R. Premadasa stadium**. 

## Current Match Schedule:
There are no other matches listed for 8th February beyond the AFG vs NZ match. For more information on upcoming matches, please refer to the official ICC MT20 WC, 2026 schedule.

## Matches on 7th February
The following matches are scheduled for 7th February:

* **NED vs PAK**: This match will be held at the **Sinhalese Sports Club, Colombo**, and will begin at **11:00 IST (05:30 GMT)**.

* **USA vs IND**: This match will be held at the **Wankhede Stadium, Mumbai**, and will begin at **19:00 IST (13:30 GMT)**.

* All three matches will be part of the **ICC MT20 WC, 2026**.

* The provided context does not list any other matches for 7th February beyond these three.

The above information provides the schedule for all matches on 7th February. If you need more information, please refer to the official **ICC MT20 WC, 2026 schedule**.

## Groups in T20 World Cup 2026
The different groups in the T20 World Cup 2026 are:
* **Group A**: Includes teams such as India, Namibia, Netherlands, Pakistan, and USA
* **Group B**: Includes teams such as Australia, Ireland, Oman, Sri Lanka, and Zimbabwe
* **Group C**: Includes teams such as England, Italy, Nepal, Scotland, and West Indies
* **Group D**: Includes teams such as Afghanistan, Canada, New Zealand, South Africa, and UAE

faq's for the world cup

## T20 World Cup FAQs
Some key points about the T20 World Cup 2026 include:
* The tournament features 20 teams divided into four groups of five.
* The top two teams from each group advance to the Super Eight stage.
* Team standings are determined by points, with two points awarded for a win and no points for a defeat.
* In case of a tie in points, the team with the higher net run rate is ranked higher.
* The final is scheduled for March 8, 2026, in Ahmedabad/Colombo.
* Group placements are determined by predetermined seedings.
* The points table is affected by weather-affected matches, with both teams receiving one point each in case of abandonment or a tie due to rain. 

Note: For a detailed list of FAQs, more information would be required.
